name: Last Stand (0xDiddi)
description:
Last Stand is tower-defense as you know and love it, but with a twist: your towers are powered by the energy pylons on the road, and when enemies reach them, they shut down! That means towers powered by that pylon will no longer work!

So plan wisely and don't let the enemies come to far, or otherwise you'll quickly be running out of space.

How to play:

Click on a powered building slot to build a tower. Available towers are:

  • Gun Turret (50$)
  • Advanced Gun Turret (50$)
  • Rocket Turret (75$)
  • Advanced Rocket Turret (75$)

Note: This game is likely far from balanced. Balancing strategy games is always a process that required a lot of time and testing.

There also are only 4 waves and no end-screen for now. So when the game says you're in wave 5 and there are no more enemies left, you're done!
